Astropologist said he was waiting for every zodiac sign in November 2023 - monthly forecast

Astropologist said he was waiting for every zodiac sign in November 2023 - the monthly prognosis of Avena for November would be a month of new opportunities and prospects. You'll be able to make great progress in careers or business. It is important, however, not to overburden itself with work and to devote time to rest and family. Telephones will focus on their personal relations in November. You have to make an important decision that will affect your future. Be careful, and don't take decisions to burn. The twins of the twins have a lot to travel and communicate with new people in November. You will expand your mind and learn a lot of new things about yourself and the world. Cancer for Racks will be a month of change in November. You can change the job, place of residence or even partner. Be ready for change and bold...

The telegram doesn't work, what happened and when it comes to work.

On the night of 30 October 2023, the Telegram Messenger suffered a breakdown. Users from southern Russia could not access the service without using VPN. The malfunction affected both the mobile application and the Massenger website. According to the DownDetector portal, more than 17,000 users complained about Telegram issues. Most of them reported that the massenger was not working without the VPN. The reasons for the malfunction in Telegram have not yet been reported. The company representatives stated that they were working to resolve the problem and promised to re-establish the service shortly. What regions were affected by the disruption According to the DownDetector, the failure in Telegram affected users from the following regions of Russia: the Krasnodar province of the Rostov region of Stavropol province of the Volgograd Region of the Astrakhan province of Kalmakiy Dagestan Chech Ingushetia also affected users from...

At Mahakkala airport, the angry crowd broke into the airfield looking for passengers from Tel Aviv

The Dagestanis are running through the airstrip field and looking for the arrivals of the Jews. At Makhachkala Airport on the evening of 29 October, a crowd of hundreds of Daguestans broke into the airport and on the airstrip, climbed on the wings of planes and fled the field. The airport was supposed to come from Israel. The rumors that the Jewish refugees were on board had provoked anti-Semitic sentiments, stagnating anti-Jewish slogans and holding posters, “There was no place in Dagestan and “We against Jewish refugees” At the exit of their airport, the crowd stopped cars and searched for Jews, who were supposed to come as refugees to Dagestan. " Careful, news " reports that Rosgvardiya fighters have arrived at the airport, so that the crowd cannot coordinate its actions. Crowders run the field, get caught on the passengers on the flights, and airport staff try to contain. ...

Magic rites in the Velez Night: How to fulfil the cherished desire from 31 October to 1 November

The big night, or the night of all the saints, is an ancient pagan holiday which is celebrated on the night of 31 October at 1 November. At this time, according to trust, a portal opens between the living and the world of the dead, and the souls of the ancestors can return to our world. Therefore, the Velez Night is the time when you can turn to your ancestors for help and advice, as well as to conduct magical rites that can help to fulfil the cherished desires. To call ancestors One of the simplest ways to call ancestors on the Velez Night is to put a candle on the table or on the windows and leave a candle near. Fresh symbolizes the light that attracts the souls of the ancestors and the treating is a sign of respect for them. Sit in front of the candle and close your eyes. You ask your ancestors...

Halloween is a holiday that takes place on the night of 31 October at 1 November. He has ancient roots and is linked to the cult of the dead. On this day, people wear costumes and masks to scare off evil spirits. Women ' s Happiness Day 2024: traditions and gift ideas

Women ' s Happiness Day 2024: The traditions and gifts of 11 June 2024 mark Women ' s Happiness Day worldwide. This holiday is aimed at combating depression and other mental problems to which every second woman in the world is exposed. The tradition of Women ' s Happiness Day on this day is to congratulate all women on the holiday, give them gifts and pay attention. There are several traditional ways to celebrate Women ' s Happiness Day: To start the day with congratulations and gifts. Order favorite flowers and buy sweets. Organize a programme of the day. Invite your woman to a café or a restaurant. You can have a romantic dinner, and I'm going to order a house. Take care of the beautiful deed. Take a day together. Show me what's next, and you don't care about her problems and her mental experiences. Go to shopping together...

Tatiana Day 2024: exact date, history and tradition of the holiday

Tatiyanin Day is an unofficial student holiday that is celebrated annually. On that day, it was accepted that all girls should be congratulated with the name of Tatiana and that the session should end. The history of Tatiyanin ' s Day began in 1755, when Moscow University was founded. It is on this day that Empress Elizabeth Petrovna signed a decree establishing the university. In 1804, King Nikolay I issued a decree according to which 25 January was the official birthday of all Russian universities. On that day, university celebrations were held in which students, teachers and authorities participated. Tatiyanin was banned in Soviet years, but after the collapse of the USSR, he was again a popular student holiday. Tatiyanin's birthday is a day of fun and care. On this day, students...

In 2024 we have two most mystical days, two Fridays of the 13th.

In 2024 we have two most mystical days, two Fridays of the 13th. This date falls on 13 September and winter on 13 December. Friday's fear of the 13th Fear of Friday's 13th is called parascadetryphobia. It's one of the most common superstitions in the world. People who are afraid of the 13th Fridays often think that something bad can happen this day. They can avoid any business and contact so they don't get into trouble. The story of Friday's 13th Fear of Friday's 13th is beginning in mid-century Europe. On Friday, 13 October 2007, King Philip IV of France ordered the arrest and execution of the members of the Tamplier Order. This event was the beginning of the fall of the Order and its persecution. Since then, Friday 13th is considered unhappy. People connect with...

On 29 October 2023, the 612th day of Russia ' s special military operation in Ukraine, marked the following events: the mass rally in Istanbul in support of Palestine gathered more than a million people. At a rally that took place at Atatürk airport, President Regep Taip Erdogan of Turkey described the massacres taking place in the Gaza Strip. It called on the international community to take action to end the conflict. The Prime Minister of Scotland, Nikola Sterdgen, complained about raping white people in his government. In a video show that appeared in social media, Sternjen stated that the Scottish Government lacked ethnic minorities. She called for an increase in their number. President Beloroussiy Alexander Lukashenko stated that it was time to negotiate on Ukraine. He also cautioned that in the event of the third world war Europe would be destroyed. The experts said that the decision of the Central Bank of Russia to raise the key rate...

These three zodiac signs will have an urgent and difficult day on 29 October 2023

The Moon of Opposition to Mars is creating a tense atmosphere that can lead to emotional spikes, anger outbreaks and uncontrolled words. This may be particularly difficult for three zodiac signs: Ovnov, Scorpion and Koserogov. Ovnas are fire signs that are known to be impulsive and direct. On this day, they may be particularly inclined to flash anger and unthinkable words. It's important that Ovna keep themselves in hand and think before talking. Scorpion scorpions are a water poem that is known for its passion and emotion. On this day they can be particularly sensitive and sensitive to criticism. It is important that the Scorpions do not allow their emotions to prevail over them. Coseroogy's coserogs are a terrestrial poem that is known for its practicality and purpose.
